General.Name: Zhubo Design
General.Description: Zhubo Design Co., Ltd provides integrated design services in China. It offers architectural design services for residential buildings, medical and elderly care buildings, commercial complexes and super high-rises, hotels, resort properties, office and industrial park buildings, schools and cultural, sports buildings, exhibition areas, and interior design. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Block B, Shumye Tairan Cedar Building, Shenzhen, China, 518040
